Author: dogracer#3298
Content: Is there some way to see the list of orders without first typing in both a coin and an amount on the trade screen? I'm obsessively compulsively check this for RICK/KMD and MORTY/KMD and all I am succeeding at is wearing down my mobile battery. Would be awesome to have some sort of notifications or at least a refresh button of sorts.

Author: 27aume#8635
Content:
Yes same here xD, ive proposed the refresh button to.
No at the moment unless you run a full node(lp node) theres no way to just query the orderbook.

Author: 27aume#8635
Content: Also at the moment. The way the order book is displayed and loads isnt super intuitive. Im never sure if it loaded properly or if im having an issue, it leave a lot of uncertainty in the accuracy of what is displayed.

Author: 27aume#8635
Content: Adding a "last updated at x date" plus a refresh feature would make it more consistent i think.

Content:
Here's what i have today
22-07-2019

- created order: morty_kmd 12h30
- canceled by uninstall reinstall at 13h50 (reinstall because doubt of accuracy of orderbook)
- rick_morty timedout
- kmd_rfox success

Content:
I think i just found a little UI bug:

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
https://discordapp.com/channels/412898016371015680/449949868904022036/602979405471678474
```
3:14 AM] Mr. Orange: Hello.  I have some feed back on the mobile DEX.  Very good so far.  I have done 11 swaps.  6 Timeout failures.  For some reason, the tactile feedback on entering my pin could be more sensitive.  For the 6 number password, it often only registers 5 numbers. Not sure why, but it happens more often than not.  Also, when a atomic swap fails, it would be better to have the error message stay up until you confirm OK.  Many times I am trying to read the error message but it dissapears before I finish reading it.  Overall, the mobile DEX is impressive and I am excited for Komodo's future.  Keep up the great work. :ok_hand:
```
feedback from another channel @TonyL

Author: Vanncoins#3044
Content: Found a bug with the new update that could potentially cause problems, it’s a bit difficult to explain but I’ll give it a shot. First I hit max on the coin I’m trying to sell, then I select the coin I want to buy. There isn’t enough of the coin to buy, so it reduces the amount I’m selling. I noticed the amount I was selling was very small for the amount of the coin I’d be getting. I thought there must be some mistake, why am I getting such a good rate? I almost didn’t think twice and almost hit the swap button thinking I’d hit the lotto, but then I checked again on the selling amount. It displayed 62.347838, but after tapping the amount field, it scrolled over to reveal that the amount was actually 162.347838. This could definitely cause some issues

Author: Vanncoins#3044
Content: Also, in this screenshot of a transaction, the button in the top right (circled in red), I believe it’s a button to view the transaction in a separate block explorer, but it doesn’t work, it exits the app. It happens on any transaction from any coin

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: Button works for me on android s10e. Check to make sure you have a default browser set
